participant_1.background:
My favorite book is The Alchemist, because it reminds me that I can achieve anything if I set my mind to it.
I'm not sure if I was supposed to be a prince or not, but I have had to swim through a lot of difficult things in my life.
I'm often not taken seriously because of my pink hair.
i prefer texting over phone calls.
i like to fly model airplanes.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy being able to help my mother out when she needs me.
i don t know if i enjoy programming , or if it s my only choice.
I like to dye my hair blue because it reminds me of the ocean.
I am the only member of my immediate family who is not employed by Sears.
i have long flowing hair.

content.text: Hey there! How's your day going?
Great so far! What about you?
It's going pretty good. I just read a really good book called The Alchemist.
Oh, I've heard of that one! Is it about the prince who goes on a journey to find a treasure?
Yes, that's the one! It's a really good book. It's about how you can achieve anything if you set your mind to it.
That sounds like a really good message. I'm going to have to read it sometime.
You should! It's a really quick and easy read, too.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to fly model airplanes. I also like to read and go to the movies.
Oh, that's cool! I've never flown a model airplane before.
It's a lot of fun! You should try it sometime.
Mine is too! I like the way it looks on my hair.
I like it because it reminds me of the ocean.
